attributes.action: Make Diwalli, Holi, Vinayaka Chavithi public holidays
attributes.additional_details: I want the Goverment to do it because a lot of Hindu families don’t get to have the day off on very special occasions as they have work or school and especially for Hindus that immigrated to the UK, they need this chance to unite with other Hindu Families.
attributes.background: I want the Government to make Diwali, Holi, Vinayaka Chavithi a public holiday. What I mean by this is giving the day of work, school for Hindu families to unite and celebrate together.
